pages.title: Spruce Wood!
pages.text: Gathering $(#FFA500)Spruce Wood $()is simple! This is the 3rd capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Item Given: Spruce Wood

pages.name: Capability Level 200
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 200$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Spruce Wood$()
